text: Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ bhikkhuniparipācitaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjeyya aññatra pubbe gihisamārambhā pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ bhikkhuniparipācitaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjeyya aññatra pubbe gihisamārambhā pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 29. Should any bhikkhu knowingly eat almsfood donated through the prompting of a bhikkhunī, except for food that householders had already intended for him prior (to her prompting), it is to be confessed.
๒๙. อนึ่ง ภิกษุใดรู้อยู่ฉันบิณฑบาตอันภิกษุณีแนะนําให้ถวายเว้นไว้แต่คฤหัสถ์ปรารภไว้ก่อน เป็นปาจิตตีย์
29. Should any bhikkhu knowingly eat almsfood procured through (the instigation of) a bhikkhuni, unless it was already intended by householders (for bhikkhus), it entails expiation.
